list.name: Light of Foliar Incision
list.description: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used todestroy countless poisons that infested the forest.

list.name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
list.description: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that thiscan be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end ofthe ocean of sand.

ascension_materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew

Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

list.name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
list.description: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name "Haran" comes from themanner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.

list.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
list.description: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes fromit having been broken once before.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
list.description: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to bean audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

list.name: Summit Shaper
list.description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of amountain.

list.name: Freedom-Sworn
list.description: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths offreedom taken in the Land of Wind.

list.name: Skyward Blade
list.description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. Theblessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing thesword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

list.name: Aquila Favonia
list.description: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on thewinds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine whowielded it.

list.name: The Dockhand's Assistant
list.description: A convenient cutting tool that you can rarely find nowadays. You can replacethe dulled blades as you use them.

list.name: Fleuve Cendre Ferryman
list.description: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It wasfamous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.

list.name: Finale of the Deep
list.description: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even moreancient than its stylings might imply.

list.name: Toukabou Shigure
list.description: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one usedto the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scenebeneath this parasol.

list.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
list.description: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that anow-silent Jinni dwells within it.

ascension_materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

list.name: Sapwood Blade
list.description: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of ablade that can cut down the foes of the forest.

ascension_materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

list.name: Kagotsurube Isshin
list.description: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of"Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

list.name: Cinnabar Spindle
list.description: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power withinmight even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode amighty dragon.

list.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
list.description: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior,known for their incredible agility, in midair.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Festering Desire
list.description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with ashriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

list.name: Sword of Descension
list.description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.

list.name: The Alley Flash
list.description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamedthe benighted streets.

list.name: The Black Sword
list.description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is saidthat this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine ofslaughter.

list.name: Blackcliff Longsword
list.description: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glowon its black blade.

list.name: Iron Sting
list.description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreigntraders. It is light, agile, and sharp.

list.name: Prototype Rancour
list.description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts throughrocks like a hot knife through butter.

list.name: Lion's Roar
list.description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise ondurability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.

list.name: Royal Longsword
list.description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt.Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature ofits owner.

list.name: Sacrificial Sword
list.description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it arestill visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

list.name: The Flute
list.description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings asswiftly as the wind.

list.name: Favonius Sword
list.description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed withthis agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has neverbeen so easy!

list.name: Skyrider Sword
list.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as aflying sword...

list.name: Fillet Blade
list.description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

list.name: Dark Iron Sword
list.description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.

list.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
list.description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, andother useful items in its sheath.

list.name: Harbinger of Dawn
list.description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will beblessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has longworn off.

list.name: Cool Steel
list.description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the greatadventures of its old master.

list.name: Silver Sword
list.description: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, notpure silver.

list.name: Dull Blade
list.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then makeit up with valiance.

list.name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
list.description: A large, flat-tipped sword designed in to fit as the weapon of an ancient kingor some ceremonial instrument.

list.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
list.description: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn StoicStonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monsterpacking with its tail between its legs.

list.name: The Unforged
list.description: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgelessclaymore seems to possess divine might.

list.name: Song of Broken Pines
list.description: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless tothe corrupt as a typhoon.

list.name: Wolf's Gravestone
list.description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of irongiven to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed withlegendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

list.name: Skyward Pride
list.description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. Whenswung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the skyand the wind is unleashed.

list.name: Portable Power Saw
list.description: An old-school power saw that you can rarely find nowadays. It was once acutting tool trusted by workers all around.

ascension_materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

list.name: Tidal Shadow
list.description: An exquisitely-crafted, standard-model sword forged for the high-rankingofficers and flagship captains of Fontaine's old navy.

ascension_materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

list.name: Talking Stick
list.description: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

list.name: Mailed Flower
list.description: A graceful and elegant greatsword that is decorated with flowers and ribbons.

list.name: Forest Regalia
list.description: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of agreatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest.

ascension_materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

list.name: Akuoumaru
list.description: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic,but is surprisingly easy to wield.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Makhaira Aquamarine
list.description: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand yearsof sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.

list.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
list.description: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

list.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
list.description: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weaponas well as emergency sustenance.

list.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
list.description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged fromStarsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

list.name: Lithic Blade
list.description: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.

list.name: Serpent Spine
list.description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of theageless waves as one swings it.

list.name: Blackcliff Slasher
list.description: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a darkcrimson color from the blade to pommel.

list.name: Whiteblind
list.description: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way intoLiyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands ofsomeone who knows how to use it.

list.name: Prototype Archaic
list.description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with suchan immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

list.name: Rainslasher
list.description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with bruteforce and raw power.

list.name: Royal Greatsword
list.description: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It ismade from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. Aweapon for use by the nobility only.

list.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
list.description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets onit are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the windsof time.

list.name: The Bell
list.description: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internalmechanisms have long been damaged.

list.name: Favonius Greatsword
list.description: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elementalpower easily and is highly destructive.

list.name: Skyrider Greatsword
list.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as aflying sword... for the second time.

list.name: Debate Club
list.description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in anydebater's arsenal.

list.name: Quartz
list.description: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a goldengilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.

list.name: White Iron Greatsword
list.description: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power.Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadlyin the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

list.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
list.description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering itinvulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

list.name: Ferrous Shadow
list.description: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the powerof a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself asthe great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.

list.name: Old Merc's Pal
list.description: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

list.name: Waster Greatsword
list.description: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains ifwielded with enough willpower.

list.name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
list.description: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it thatthese staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainernow lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.

list.name: Engulfing Lightning
list.description: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon willprobably be likewise cut down...

list.name: Calamity Queller
list.description: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue lightseems to whisper of countless matters now past.

list.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
list.description: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.

list.name: Vortex Vanquisher
list.description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one canalmost see the rift it tears in the air.

list.name: Skyward Spine
list.description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of thisweapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

list.name: Staff of Homa
list.description: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

list.name: Prospector's Drill
list.description: A long drill that you can rarely find nowadays. it was often used in delvingand in carving stones.

list.name: Rightful Reward
list.description: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.

ascension_materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

list.name: Ballad of the Fjords
list.description: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets noneescape.

ascension_materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

list.name: Missive Windspear
list.description: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on thebreeze remains a gentle thing...

list.name: Moonpiercer
list.description: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It is shaped like a giant arrowand can be used as a spear.

list.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
list.description: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It wasonce the possession of the tengu race.

list.name: "The Catch"
list.description: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

list.name: Kitain Cross Spear
list.description: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded theTatarigami on Yashiori Island.

list.name: Dragonspine Spear
list.description: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

list.name: Royal Spear
list.description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governedMondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is stillincomparably sharp.

list.name: Favonius Lance
list.description: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight,and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

list.name: Lithic Spear
list.description: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows noequal.

list.name: Deathmatch
list.description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Itsawl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.

list.name: Blackcliff Pole
list.description: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow onits cold black sheen.

list.name: Crescent Pike
list.description: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent bladeat the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. Withpractice, it can deal heavy damage.

list.name: Prototype Starglitter
list.description: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmersalong the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

list.name: Dragon's Bane
list.description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, thisweapon may very well kill dragons with ease.

list.name: Black Tassel
list.description: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegantsolution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

list.name: Halberd
list.description: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot ofdamage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.

list.name: White Tassel
list.description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft andsharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

list.name: Iron Point
list.description: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popularamong travelers.

list.name: Beginner's Protector
list.description: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations,it has an imposing presence when swung.

list.name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
list.description: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within anunderwater training center. Today, none know of its existence.

list.name: Cashflow Supervision
list.description: A floating device that can monitor certain phenomena. It was picked up andmodified to serve other purposes following its abandonment.

ascension_materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

materials.name: Broken Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Wine Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
Golden Goblet of the Pristine Sea

list.name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
list.description: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crispas they are distant.

list.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
list.description: This lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and inits emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.

list.name: Kagura's Verity
list.description: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself.The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

list.name: Everlasting Moonglow
list.description: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiancelike that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Jadefall's Splendor
list.description: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and theclear waters.

list.name: Memory of Dust
list.description: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformationsreveal the power within.

list.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
list.description: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped thewind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence overthe millennia.

list.name: Skyward Atlas
list.description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. Itdetails the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powersof the sky and wind.

list.name: Ballad of the Boundless Blue
list.description: A collection of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few pieces concerningthe skies, dandelions, and other topics beloved by Mondstadters.

list.name: Flowing Purity
list.description: A strangely-shaped anthology of scripts. All the scripts written by Coppeliusare recorded within.

list.name: Sacrificial Jade
list.description: An ancient jade pendant that gleams like clear water. It seems to have beenused in ancient ceremonies.

list.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
list.description: A fruit you obtained from an Aranara tale. It holds the potential to conquerany crisis.

list.name: Wandering Evenstar
list.description: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and performcalculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.

list.name: Oathsworn Eye
list.description: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With thecoming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths andwishes.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Hakushin Ring
list.description: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times.However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of herthought.

ascension_materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

materials.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

list.name: Dodoco Tales
list.description: A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot helpbut laugh.  Even those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbedby the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.

list.name: Frostbearer
list.description: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanatesfrom it.

list.name: Wine and Song
list.description: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has becomeforgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

list.name: Eye of Perception
list.description: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity ofone's heart.

list.name: Blackcliff Agate
list.description: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has anominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremorsfrom deep within the earth.

list.name: Mappa Mare
list.description: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found itsway into Liyue via foreign traders.

list.name: Prototype Amber
list.description: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems toglow with the very light from the sky.

list.name: Solar Pearl
list.description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light ofthe sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.

list.name: Royal Grimoire
list.description: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served thenobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as wellas magic spells.

list.name: Sacrificial Fragments
list.description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed itemeroded by the winds of time.

list.name: The Widsith
list.description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damageand heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

list.name: Favonius Codex
list.description: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. Itdescribes the logic and power of elements and matter.

list.name: Amber Bead
list.description: A catalyst carved out of amber that gains a warm halo under the sun.

list.name: Twin Nephrite
list.description: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.

list.name: Emerald Orb
list.description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue.Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."

list.name: Otherworldly Story
list.description: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possessesthe power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

list.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
list.description: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It ispoorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessonsthat can be learned from failure.

list.name: Magic Guide
list.description: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-newadditions based on recent developments.

list.name: Pocket Grimoire
list.description: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magicexam.

list.name: Apprentice's Notes
list.description: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and thehandwriting is beautiful.

list.name: The First Great Magic
list.description: A stage prop once used by a past "Great Magician." Its final secret was thatit was also a weapon beyond the pale.

list.name: Hunter's Path
list.description: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felledcountless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.

list.name: Thundering Pulse
list.description: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles allaround it.

list.name: Aqua Simulacra
list.description: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on alustrous, watery blue.

list.name: Polar Star
list.description: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

list.name: Elegy for the End
list.description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like alamenting sigh.

list.name: Amos' Bow
list.description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its originalmaster being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in theworld, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, themore powerful it is.

list.name: Skyward Harp
list.description: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. Thesound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains thepower of the sky and wind within.

list.name: Range Gauge
list.description: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable fofiring arrows.

list.name: Song of Stillness
list.description: A strange longbow that resembles a sea creature. Its string makes no sound atall.

list.name: Scion of the Blazing Sun
list.description: An ancient longbow that is a remnant of King Deshret's ancient era. Anindecipherable ancient text and solemn patterns have been carved into it.

list.name: Ibis Piercer
list.description: A golden bow forged from the description in the story. If you use it as anormal weapon, you can also view it as a part of a fictional world that hasmade it off the pages.

ascension_materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

materials.name: Copper Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Iron Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Silver Talisman of the Forest Dew
Golden Talisman of the Forest Dew

list.name: End of the Line
list.description: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that astring may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.

list.name: King's Squire
list.description: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bowthat can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

list.name: Mouun's Moon
list.description: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flowsalong its moonlight-colored arms.

list.name: Predator
list.description: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.

list.name: Hamayumi
list.description: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassingskill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

list.name: Windblume Ode
list.description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equallynameless person.

list.name: Mitternachts Waltz
list.description: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.

list.name: Fading Twilight
list.description: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with thelight of eventide.

list.name: Alley Hunter
list.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who wasnever caught.

list.name: The Viridescent Hunt
list.description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose homewas the forest.

list.name: Blackcliff Warbow
list.description: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requiresan archer with a strong bow arm to use.

list.name: Compound Bow
list.description: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult tomaintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

list.name: Prototype Crescent
list.description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired fromthis bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

list.name: Rust
list.description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strengthto even lift it, let alone fire it.

list.name: Royal Bow
list.description: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers ofMondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and canstill fire arrows with great force.

list.name: Sacrificial Bow
list.description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets onit are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the windsof time.

list.name: The Stringless
list.description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capableof getting people up and dancing.

list.name: Favonius Warbow
list.description: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archerscan unleash its full potential.

list.name: Ebony Bow
list.description: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is alsoa far more powerful weapon.

list.name: Messenger
list.description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.

list.name: Slingshot
list.description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to thedesign, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made whatwas actually a bow.

list.name: Recurve Bow
list.description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately howtrue that is depends on the skill of the archer.

list.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
list.description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off astrong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

list.name: Raven Bow
list.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decoratedwith raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.

list.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
list.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by itsowner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

list.name: Hunter's Bow
list.description: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring andthe whoosh of soaring arrows.
